siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Be deliberate with time by planning - especially when busy
frontmatter.description: Be deliberate with time by setting clear expectations of time & outcomes prior to beginning. This is especially important when busy in order to avoid waste of time. Blocks of time should be invested to make future better. There's no getting time back; it can and should be used wisely to make future better.

frontmatter.title: Develop sleep routines to allow brain to process inputs and changes
frontmatter.description: There’s been a lot to process lately - changes to daily work life, environments, etc, along with a number of possible futures that hadn’t been strongly considered back in January.  Sleep routines help brain better process inputs and changes

frontmatter.title: Build habits by creating streaks of small daily goals
frontmatter.description: Build habits by creating streaks of small daily goals. Start small and let the momentum and experience guide the progression.

frontmatter.title: Create more output channels
frontmatter.description: Create more output channels to better process intake of information & formulate ideas from unique combination of intake and experience.
